top.title: The Download: AI and the economy, and slop for the masses
top.summary: In recent months, a new class of agents has arrived on the scene: ones built using large language models. LLM agents don‚Äôt have much of a track record yet, but to hear CEOs tell it, they will transform the economy‚Äîand soon. Despite that, like chatbot LLMs, agents can be chaotic and unpredictable.

Mercado.summary: VMware has become a focal point of these dueling directives. It remains central to enterprise IT, with 80% of organizations using VMware infrastructure products. In recent years, an even more persistent threat has emerged.
